item.title: Album of the Year 2021
item.description: Every year, top champ Pip runs a Facebook group to work out the Album Of The Year within an extended friendship group. For the past few years I’ve been making graphs to summarise the results, using some slightly clunky Jupyter notebooks. At first this just analysed the albums chosen by the group, and then last year (after I did my TTNG analysis) I expanded it to include some Spotify data too.
